problem.markdown:
>>What are the important aspects that Closed Jackson Network model of an FMS fails to consider? << [x] The change over time of a machine from one part time to another. [ ] The total number of pallets. [x] The fact that different parts might require different kinds of fixtures. [x] In reality, the storage space is not always infinite.
[explanation] All models are approximations of reality and have limited set of uses. A closed model considers the number of pallets in the system as a constant, and therefore is considered. [explanation]
